meta.title: Non-Traditional Instruction and COVID-19 Information - Bellevue Independent Schools

link.title: Grandview Elementary - News

form.name: aspnetForm

span.p: Bellevue Independent Schools will be closed for Non-Traditional Instruction Days for the remainder of the school year. The last day of school will be Wednesday, May 13th. Click the NTI/COVID-19 Icon on the homepage for more information.

h3.img: Please refer to this page for the most up-to-date information regarding NTI days and the COVID-19 coronavirus.

span.strong: Bellevue Independent Schools will continue NTI days through Wednesday, May 13th. School buildings are closed.

p.span: At the recommendation of Governor Beshear, Bellevue Independent Schools will continue NTI days through the remainder of the school year. The last day of the 2019-2020 school year will be Wednesday, May 13th, 2020. More information will follow soon.

All students in the district were sent home with books to read as their assignment for Monday. Teachers will be communicating next steps Monday afternoon to all families regarding NTI materials and expectations for student learning moving forward.

On Tuesday, March 17th, instructional materials will be ready for pickup anytime from 7am to 6 pm from your students’ school. Middle/High School students must be present to login if picking up a school device.

div.div:
This is a secure Staff Intranet content page and cannot be viewed by the public. Please contact your Technology Director to gain access to the Staff Intranet area in order to view this page.
Thank you,
